title: Maxelele
author: Maxelele
content: Hey guys,I need a 700â‚¬ loan. I could pay back 850â‚¬ at the end of this month.I have no crypto collateral to offer, as I would have cashed it out otherwise.Already needed the money since last week but I couldnâ€™t find a way to get it. Already asked some friends and family member, without any luck.I know Iâ€™m a completely new user and probably no1 will trust me but I would be ready so send all information about me, which u need. Like ID, proof of income etc. Would also verify those documents, if you donâ€™t believe itâ€™s me. Iâ€™m from Germany btw.Little to no hope that someone will lend me something but I still wanted to ask here, as im desperate atm and MAYBE there is someone out there who could help out.If you have any questions or need further information, just ask here or in dm.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: Maxelele on July 23, 2023, 08:52:22 PMI know Iâ€™m a completely new user and probably no1 will trust me but I would be ready so send all information about me, which u need. Like ID, proof of income etc. Would also verify those documents, if you donâ€™t believe itâ€™s me. Iâ€™m from Germany btw.What would one do with your information? Going to police and tell them this guy scammed me 700â‚¬ and inter-pool is going to catch you to give the 700â‚¬ back to the lender? Who will even go this far LOLIf you have no one near you to support you with money then you are not belong to that society. Try to move to an island and live a life where you don't even need to wear the cloths ðŸ˜‰

Who will even go this far LOLIf you have no one near you to support you with money then you are not belong to that society. Try to move to an island and live a life where you don't even need to wear the cloths ðŸ˜‰ I mean Iâ€™m just trying to create some trust with those information and if the lender is from Germany he could in fact do something with this information, I think.Im sorry but not everyone has a rich family or friends who can quickly lend some money.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: Maxelele on July 23, 2023, 09:39:49 PMI mean Iâ€™m just trying to create some trust with those information and if the lender is from Germany he could in fact do something with this information, I think.No one here has the ability to authenticate ID, and they're too easily faked. Â The offer alone makes you look untrustworthy. Â Quote from: Maxelele on July 23, 2023, 09:39:49 PMIm sorry but not everyone has a rich family or friends who can quickly lend some money.One doesn't have to be rich to help a family member or friend with a â‚¬700 loan or gift if the person is altruistic.Â  Statements like that poke holes in your story.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: Maxelele on July 23, 2023, 09:39:49 PMI mean Iâ€™m just trying to create some trust with those information and if the lender is from Germany he could in fact do something with this information, I think.Im sorry but not everyone has a rich family or friends who can quickly lend some money.You need to understand that you are a stranger on the forum. You have not record, no one knows you, seen you before. You have nothing to lose if you fail to repay the lender. Consider me. If I loan from someone, I have everything to lose if I do not replay them. In fact I will not allow anyone to destroy my account even for a few BTC at today's price. This account is a history, pride for me. And the pride, the history worth more than any amount of money. A lender knows it and they will never hesitate to lend me any amount that they think is safe for them to lose.I am sorry if you are really in problem but this is unrealistic for you to expect anything from an unknown place.

comments.author: Maxelele

Â Statements like that poke holes in your story.Didnâ€™t knew that offer makes me untrustworthy. I know all that stuff can be faked easily but I also mentioned, that I would also be ready to verify those documents.The ones I asked ( Friends & Family who know and trust me ), donâ€™t have spare money. But you donâ€™t have to believe me.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Maxelele on July 23, 2023, 08:52:22 PMAlready needed the money since last week but I couldnâ€™t find a way to get it. Already asked some friends and family member, without any luck.You need to keep pushing, last week when you needed the loan you didn't die, that means even this week you will live. Get something to temporarily do to get you some money to keep you afloat until you get that money you expect at the end of this month. It's just a few days away.Quote from: Maxelele on July 23, 2023, 08:52:22 PMI know Iâ€™m a completely new user and probably no1 will trust me but I would be ready so send all information about me, which u need. Like ID, proof of income etc. Would also verify those documents, if you donâ€™t believe itâ€™s me. Iâ€™m from Germany btw.Your ID or proof of income won't help the lender recover his money in case you default the loan. Just try providing the same "collateral" to the banks and see if it will work.

But whatever, itâ€™s my problem and already understood that probably no1 would trust me.Best practice now is to lock the topic and move on. I can only wish somehow you solve your problem. But from this forum, you have zero chances. In fact if you continue pushing here, some will put you in their distrust list and will leave you negative feedback. I am sure you have no idea how this forum works.Sort out yourself then when you are good, come back to this forum. Spend time with us. May be some day you will be able to earn some pocket money from this place. But don't hope for anything now.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: Quote from: Maxelele on July 23, 2023, 08:52:22 PMLittle to no hope that someone will lend me something but I still wanted to ask here, as im desperate atm and MAYBE there is someone out there who could help out.Little to no hope is right.Itâ€™s a lot youâ€™re asking for, 700â‚¬ and youâ€™ve got no reputation on the forum being a new user. You as well know all that disqualifies you from anyone having to risk their money with you and your ID guarantees nothing. Like what will anyone have to do with it? The cost to recovery might be as well worth more than the given loan and not everyone would like to take those steps or as well risk revealing their identity in the process.Sorry but, you donâ€™t get a chance. Try making something out of your stay here and when youâ€™ve got some value on your account with respect to the campaign and manger your attached with, you might get some benefits from being here.
